Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape.Triangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    Implements Shape interface as Triangle shape.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tolga Reis

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Shape triangle)
        Compares this and another Triangle object according to areas.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        triangle - takes another triangle as parameter and compares them respect to their areas.
        Returns:
        result of the comparing. If this is greater, then returns 1. if this is less, then returns -1. if they are equal, then returns 0.
